explanation: [0-0] This is a scene from Minecraft. Inside a mine made of gray stone, a girl with red hair and Steve are standing in their respective mine shafts. The girl is on the left and Steve is on the right. They both are holding diamond pickaxes. On the walls, diamonds, emeralds, and gold ores can be seen scattered around.

[0-4] The girl and Steve start digging downwards, their mine shafts getting deeper. The girl digs through the ore and exposes the sparkling diamonds underneath. She stops in surprise and starts dancing with joy.

[4-11] Then Steve stands dejectedly in his mine shaft, tears rolling down his face. He then crouches down, covering his face with his hands. The girl climbs out of her mine shaft and comes to Steve's, looking at him with concern and calling out to him. Steve looks up at the girl, his eyes filled with tears and sadness.
